summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 34, Denny's Home Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue North and Warren Avenue, from Republican Street to Mercer Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115094 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
